ISBN 978-1-71-427666-0

The photobook「Shikokuchuo 四国中央」was published in 2020, created from photography spanning four years of visits during 2016-19.

ISBN 978-1-71-428247-0

The photobook「Not Shikokuchuo, … 四国中央じゃないけど」was published simultaneously in 2020 as a counterpart, representing the artist’s photography outside of Shikokuchuo.
